title: EasyMed Homepage
desc: With EasyMed's homepage, you can easily check drug-drug and drug-food interactions, read daily polypharmacy articles, and access personalized pill reminders.

title: Check Drug-drug Interactions
desc: Scan a new drug to access its details and check for potential adverse interactions with drugs on your list. Stay updated on potential side effects and food interactions. Additionally, you have the option to add the new medication to your drug list for future reference.

title: Check Drug-food Interactions
desc: Simply take a photo of your intended food items or product barcode, and the app conducts a comprehensive analysis to flag potential adverse interactions with your drug list.

title: My Drug & Explore
desc: Missing doses will be a thing of the past! Set up reminders for your medications, ensuring timely consumption. But EasyMed isn't just about alerts. It's about empowering you with knowledge. Our educational content and daily quizzes provide a deeper understanding of polypharmacy.
